layout: This dashboard consists of 7 visuals and 8 global filters.
purpose: The purpose of this dashboard is to allow an in-depth investigation of the New Hires statistics.
task: The task of this dashboard is to show the New Hires statistics.

visuals.description: This element is a card. Cards display the most important facts of a report.
visuals.title: New Hires

visuals.description: This element is a line clustered column combo chart. It can combine lines and bars in one chart.
visuals.title: New Hires and New Hires Same Period Last Year
visuals.task: compare, lookup values and find trends

visuals.description: This element is a line chart.
visuals.title: New Hires by Month and FPDesc

visuals.description: This element is a card. Cards display the most important facts of a report.
visuals.title: New Hires SPLY

visuals.description: This element is a clusterd bar chart.
visuals.title: New Hires by Region and Ethnicity
visuals.task: show part-to-whole relationship, lookup values and find trends

visuals.description: This element is a slicer. Slicers act as filters for the report.
visuals.title: Region

visuals.description: This element is a slicer. Slicers act as filters for the report.
visuals.title: Ethnicity
